CutSceneText.Text: I found two fortresses that looked like Balaur temples.
Recently, I also found out that they
control the underground passage called the Silentera Canyon.
As suggested by various sources of information, I guess the Silentera Canyon is connected to Inggison.
So we should capture all the Balaur fortresses and open the door of the corridor.
If we capture all the Balaur fortresses in Inggison through the corridor,
we might be able to drive the Elyos away from Balaurea.
But if we lose the two Balaur fortresses in Gelkmaros to the Elyos,
we will be in danger so we've got to be careful.
No worries though because Agent Mastarius will take care of it if it happens.
